A '''disk''' is a [[feature]] consisting of a naturally generated roughly circular deposit of a soil-like block under or next to bodies of [[water]].

== Description ==
Disks are generated at the Euclidean distance ''n'' (i.e. x<sup>2</sup>+y<sup>2</sup>=''n''<sup>2</sup>) from a given central block, creating a circular-looking pattern of the given block with a radius of ''n''. They are commonly seen throughout [[river]]s, shallow [[ocean]]s, [[swamp]]s, and [[mangrove swamp]]s.

=== Config ===
{{main|Configured feature}}
{{el|java}}:
<section begin="config"/><div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound|config}}
** {{Nbt|compound|state_provider}} The block to use.
*** {{Nbt|compound|fallback}} The block to use when all the rules' predicates are not passed.
**** {{Nbt inherit/block state provider}}
*** {{Nbt|list|rules}} (Required, but can be empty) Rules of the block to use.
**** {{Nbt|compound}} One rule.
***** {{Nbt|compound|if_true}} The [[block predicate]] of this rule.
****** {{list indent|****|{{#lst:block predicate|json format}}}}
***** {{Nbt|compound|then}} The block to use when the predicate is passed.
****** {{Nbt inherit/block state provider}}
** {{Nbt|int}}{{Nbt|compound|radius}} The radius of this disk. Value between 0 and 8 (inclusive).
*** {{Nbt inherit/int provider}}
** {{Nbt|int|half_height}} Half of the height of this disk. Value between 0 and 4 (inclusive).
** {{Nbt|compound|target}} A [[block predicate]] that must be passed to generate this feature.
*** {{list indent|*|{{#lst:block predicate|json format}}}}
</div><section end="config"/>

{{Collapse|title=An example|outerstyle=margin: 0.5rem 0|head=1}}
<syntaxhighlight lang="json">
{
  "type": "minecraft:disk",
  "config": {
    "half_height": 1,
    "radius": {
      "type": "minecraft:uniform",
      "value": {
        "max_inclusive": 3,
        "min_inclusive": 2
      }
    },
    "state_provider": {
      "fallback": {
        "type": "minecraft:simple_state_provider",
        "state": {
          "Name": "minecraft:clay"
        }
      },
      "rules": []
    },
    "target": {
      "type": "minecraft:matching_blocks",
      "blocks": [
        "minecraft:dirt",
        "minecraft:clay"
      ]
    }
  }
}
</syntaxhighlight>
{{Collapse|tail=1}}
